mapper.select: SELECT rr.request_restaurant_id, rr.user_id, u.name AS user_name, rr.name, rr.url, rr.created_at, rr.address, rr.status, rr.approved_restaurant_id, rr.admin_user_id, rr.reject_reason, rr.updated_at FROM request_restaurants rr JOIN users u ON rr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE rr.status = 'pending'
mapper.update: UPDATE "request_restaurants" SET status = 'approved', admin_user_id = #{adminId}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE request_restaurant_id = #{requestId}
UPDATE "request_restaurants" SET status = 'reject', admin_user_id = #{adminId}, reject_reason = #{reason}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE request_restaurant_id = #{requestId}
